instructions:
A flexible character sheet compatible with D&D 5e and [Giffyglyph's Darker Dungeons](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1ufAyAnP4YTyJmOvyFQwnJZoTMTe95ETt/view?usp=sharing) ruleset.

* Fully drag-and-drop compatible with the [Roll20 Compendium](https://app.roll20.net/compendium/dnd5e/BookIndex).
* Add lingering wounds and mental afflictions that automatically update your ability modifiers.
* Track and organise your equipment with easy-to-use containers.
* Update your conditions and stress with new, color-coded helpers.
* Make defence rolls, saving throw attacks, and spell burnout checks with new roll buttons.
* Fully featured with auto-calculated fields, sheet workers, and roll buttons.
* Multi-classing and custom classes fully supported.
* Includes a complete NPC sheet to keep track of your monster profiles.
